content: Audit and catalog all existing command files in the commands directory
Apply SOLID principles to refactor command structure
Implement DRY methodology to eliminate code duplication
Build composable commands that can use other commands
Map all agents to appropriate workflow stages
Define core workflow: analyze → clarify → explore → analyze → present → plan → implement → ripple → validate → debug → recurse
Update CLAUDE.md with new command structure
Generate TICKET_REGISTRY.md with all restructuring tickets
